# Why contribute? {#contribute}

- Consolidating the most popular questions into this FAQ book will, hopefully, help us reduce answer fatigue.
Instead of answering the same questions multiple times, we can refer to the FAQ and update it for multiple questions.
- Issues and pull requests, when created, are recorded on GitHub [contribution histories](https://docs.github.com/en/github/setting-up-and-managing-your-github-profile/viewing-contributions-on-your-profile).
These histories provide visual proof of contribution to open-source projects.
Some employers look out for these contributions when making decisions to hire employees.
- For users who are new to `.git`, contributing to this project is a good way to learn version control.
